verses.verse: For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> I <S%H5414>considered<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> even to <S%H952>declare<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and their <S%H5652>works,<s%> are in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H1571>either<s%> <S%H160>love<s%> <S%H1571>or<s%> <S%H8135>hatred<s%> by <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

All <S%H3605><s%> things come <S%H834>alike<s%> to <S%H3605>all:<s%> there is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4745>event<s%> to the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and to the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> to the <S%H2896>good<s%> and to the <S%H2889>clean,<s%> and to the <S%H2931>unclean;<s%> to him that <S%H2076>sacrificeth,<s%> and to him that <S%H834>sacrificeth<s%> <S%H2076><s%> <S%H369>not:<s%> as is the <S%H2896>good,<s%> so is the <S%H2398>sinner;<s%> and he that <S%H7650>sweareth,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he that <S%H3372>feareth<s%> an <S%H7621>oath.<s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> is an <S%H7451>evil<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> things <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> there is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4745>event<s%> unto <S%H3605>all:<s%> yea, <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H1947>madness<s%> is in their <S%H3824>heart<s%> while they <S%H2416>live,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> that they go <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> to <S%H4310>him<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H2266>joined<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H986>hope:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> a <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H3611>dog<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> a <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H738>lion.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that they shall <S%H7945>die:<s%> <S%H4191><s%> but the <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H369>not<s%> any <S%H3972>thing,<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> have they any <S%H5750>more<s%> a <S%H7939>reward;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H2143>memory<s%> of them is <S%H7911>forgotten.<s%>

Also <S%H1571><s%> their <S%H160>love,<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> their <S%H8135>hatred,<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> their <S%H7068>envy,<s%> is <S%H3528>now<s%> <S%H6>perished;<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> have they any <S%H5750>more<s%> a <S%H2506>portion<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> thing <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

Go <S%H1980><s%> thy way, <S%H398>eat<s%> thy <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H8057>joy,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> thy <S%H3196>wine<s%> with a <S%H2896>merry<s%> <S%H3820>heart;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3528>now<s%> <S%H7521>accepteth<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H4639>works.<s%>

Live <S%H2416>joyfully<s%> <S%H7200><s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> thou <S%H157>lovest<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of thy <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> thee <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H1892>vanity:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> is thy <S%H2506>portion<s%> in this <S%H2416>life,<s%> and in thy <S%H5999>labor<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H6001>takest<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

Whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H4672>findeth<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> it with thy <S%H3581>might;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4639>work,<s%> nor <S%H2808>device,<s%> nor <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> nor <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> in the <S%H7585>grave,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1980>goest.<s%>

I <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H4793>race<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> to the <S%H7031>swift,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> to the <S%H1368>strong,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1571>yet<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1571>yet<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> to men of <S%H995>understanding,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1571>yet<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> to men of <S%H3045>skill;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> and <S%H6294>chance<s%> <S%H7136>happeneth<s%> <S%H853>to<s%> them <S%H3605>all.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6256>time:<s%> as the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> that are <S%H7945>taken<s%> <S%H270><s%> in an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4686>net,<s%> and as the <S%H6833>birds<s%> that are <S%H270>caught<s%> in the <S%H6341>snare;<s%> so are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H3369>snared<s%> in an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> when it <S%H7945>falleth<s%> <S%H5307><s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them.
This <S%H2090><s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> have I <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> and <S%H1931>it<s%> seemed <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me:

There was a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> within it; and there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> it, and <S%H5437>besieged<s%> it, and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4685>bulwarks<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it:

Now there was <S%H4672>found<s%> in it a <S%H4542>poor<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> by his <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H4422>delivered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city;<s%> yet <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H4542>poor<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H589>I,<s%> <S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H4480>strength:<s%> <S%H1369><s%> nevertheless the poor <S%H4542>man's<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H959>despised,<s%> and his <S%H1697>words<s%> are <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H8085>heard.<s%>
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2450>wise<s%> men are <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H5183>quiet<s%> more than the <S%H4480>cry<s%> <S%H2201><s%> of him that <S%H4910>ruleth<s%> among <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
